message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MM 

The paper proposes a new metric learning framework that can learn new capabilities for a new task while preserving previous knowledge and experiences. This problem is related to lifelong learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper also evaluates the proposed approach on several multi-task metric learning datasets, which suggests that the paper could be relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), natural language processing (cs.CL), and multimedia (cs.MM). Among these, cs.LG and cs.CV are the most likely sub-categories, as the paper focuses on metric learning and evaluates the proposed approach on image datasets.
